Question & Options:
What prestigious awards did the movie 'Lage Raho Munna Bhai' win in 2006?
Options:
A. Filmfare Awards
B. National Film Awards
C. Screen Awards
D. IIFA Awards

In the movie 'Lage Raho Munna Bhai' (2006), what was the outcome regarding its potential submission for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Film?
Options:
A. It won the Academy Award for Best Foreign Film.
B. It was submitted but did not receive a nomination.
C. It was nominated but lost to Rang De Basanti.
D. It was not considered for submission at all.
Correct Answer: It was submitted but did not receive a nomination.
